item.title: The 3 Things You Cannot Miss In Bohol
item.description: Bohol is only a 2 hour ferry ride from Cebu. There is no reason not to visit this wonderful island; it is brimming with natural wonders to entice even the fussiest of traveler. There are plenty of activities to get involved in and around Bohol but for me there were 3 main things I wanted to see. We only stayed in Bohol for 4 nights, but regardless of how long you stay be sure to include these on your list!
